16549.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「あ:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Hey <pc> have you been training
to learn all of the Paladin moves?
I've been working on mine too!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16550.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「き:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>I'm sure my next assignment will involve
watching over Jenya as her Paladin guard.
I've been training harder than ever for this.<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16551.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「さ:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Let's report to Commander Strong and
see if he can teach us any special
techniques to further our training!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16552.<start_lip_sync n01437 _normal m00001>「緊:
<start_lip_sync n01437 _normal m00001>The rumors about what happened at that
meeting aren't true are they? I can't
believe Jenya would do such a thing.<stop_lip_animation n01437 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16553.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「…: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>...What about Jenya? What happened?<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16554.<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「な:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>I knew about the tradition, but I never
thought that this would actually be the
year it would take place...<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16555.<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「１:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>Once every century, a maiden is offered
to the great dragon of the earth.
Jenya is the maiden who is to be sacrificed.<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16556.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「ジ: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>They're gonna... Sacrifice her...?<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16557.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「ど:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>What the hell are you talking about?
We've all been spending every waking
moment training to protect Jenya!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16558.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「な:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>So why the hell would we up and
sacrifice her after all that!?<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16559.<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「…:
The training was necessary to be capable of transporting Jenya safely to Earthwyrm. The sacrifice is no good if she doesn't
survive the journey there.

16561.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001><s: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001><shake_big>Quit messing around!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16562.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「殺: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>What's the point of protecting her\mjust to let some Earthworm kill her anyway!?<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16563.<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「…: <start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>That's Earthwyrm, not Earthworm.\mAnd our job as Paladins is to guard and\mprotect, whatever the mission may mean.<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16564.<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「だ:
But if the Earthwyrm awakens without a sacrifice, a great earthquake will rock the land. The sacrifice is the only way to put the
Earthwyrm back to sleep.

16565.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「た:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>So we are supposed to sacrifice Jenya to save
the people of Gartlant!? I don't approve of this
sacrifice-one-to-save-many nonsense!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16566.<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「え: <start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>It's okay, Zubo.<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16567.<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「こ: <start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>This is what I want.<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16568.<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「あ:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>I was born in a poor village deep in the mountains
where I saw children and elders die of
starvation and worse on a daily basis.<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16569.<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「み:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>We tried our best to make ends meet
for everyone, but despite our best effort
we always seemed to come up short.<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16570.<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>The reason our small village has endured is
because of our agreement to provide
sacrifices to the great dragon of the earth.<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16571.<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「だ:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>That's why King Grossner sent gold in exchange
for my coming to the castle. So that
I could be the next sacrifice, to save my people.<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16572.<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「グ:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>King Grossner was very generous and sent
plenty of gold. The people of my village won't
have to worry about food for a long time.<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16573.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「あ:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>That's what that gold was for then?
That big box of gold I delivered when you
and I first met...<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16574.<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「そ:
Yes, that's right! King Grossner tried to find another way but this is all we can do to keep the Earthwyrm satiated and the
earthquakes at bay.

16575.<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「せ:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>That's why I came here. I've made up my mind and
I'm ok with it. I want you to be the one to
take me to the dragon of the earth Zubo.<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16577.<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「大:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>The Earthwyrm is an ancient dragon with
the destructive power of a natural disaster.
It lies sleeping deep underground in  Ogreed.<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16578.<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「ひ:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>Once awakened, the earth will shift and massive
earthquakes will submerge the entire continent
into the sea. There is no resisting it's power.<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16579.<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「あ:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>Give up any daydreams you may have of fighting
it, Zubo. This is the Kings order and is therefore
beyond contention!<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16580.<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「…:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>Now then, as your commander I wish to see you
continue to grow. So I will teach you a new
technique today called the Knight Watch!<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
